extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade FortiClientEMS
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade FortiClientEMS to version 7.2.3 or above, or to version 7.0.11 or above to mitigate CVE-2023-48788.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is upgrading FortiOS or FortiProxy possible?

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade FortiOS and FortiProxy
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade FortiOS to version 7.4.2, 7.2.6, 7.0.13, 6.4.15, or 6.2.16 or above. Upgrade FortiProxy to version 7.4.1, 7.2.7, 7.0.13, or 2.0.14 or above to mitigate CVE-2023-42789 and CVE-2023-42790.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Workaround for FortiOS and FortiProxy
extracted_playbook.description: Set a non-form-based authentication scheme to mitigate CVE-2023-42789 and CVE-2023-42790.
